page.title: 02PARISH COUNCIL WILLAND
page.content: MRS GODFREY CHAIRMAN OF THE{PARISH {COUNCIL}VISITED THE SCHOOL TO TELL THE CHILDREN ABOUT THE COUNCIL'S WORK.AT THIS TIME THERE ARE 11 PEOPLE SITTING ON THE COUNCIL. THE SUB_COMITTEES ARE CALLED{CHURCH/CEMETRY, PLAYING FIELD, {ALLOTMENT,PLANNING/LIGHTING.}SHE SAID THAT AT THE MOMENTTHEY GET ABOUT Â£2000 FOR THE VILLAGE A YEAR FROM THE RATES. THEY HOPED FOR MORE WHEN THE NEW HOUSES ARE BUILT. MRS GODFREY WAS ASKED WHAT WAS THE MOST EXPENSIVE THING THE COUNCIL HAS BROUGHT FOR THE VILLAGE? SHE SAID THE CEMETRY AND EQUIPMENT FOR THE PLAYING FIELD. MRS GODFREY THEN SAID THE COUNCIL WOULD LIKE TO BUILD A{B.M.X.TRACK,}BUY MORE EQUIPMENT FOR THE PLAYING FIELD, SEE MORE SHOPS ESPECIALY A CHEMIST. DO THE COUNCIL EVER HAVE ARGUMENTS? THE CHILDREN ASKED. SHE SAID THEY USUALLY AGREED AND GO HOME WITHOUT BAD FEELING
